When adding a new record, create a snaps: When adding a new record, create a snapshot for its relational record and save in the current record. The snapshot is not updated when the record is subsequently updated.
When adding a new record, create a snapshot for its relational record and save in the new record. The snapshot will not be updated when the relational record is updated.
